title: NXIVM Revisited (Re-release)
description:
Hey everyone! We're taking the week off, but we'll be back next week with an all new episode. We decided to re-release this episode since the new HBO docuseries "The Vow" has propelled this story back into the news.
You can also head over to our Patreon for some bonus content like our weekly mixed bags and monthly minisodes.
Thanks so much & keep it creepy!
Self-Help. Personal Growth. Life-improvement. Multi-level marketing schemes promise riches, better lives, and unimagined happiness. But beneath the surface of this organization was a secret society that drained its members of money, personal autonomy, and even their lives.
Support Sinisterhood
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Hey everyone! We're taking the week off, but we'll be back next week with an all new episode. We decided to re-release this episode since the new HBO docuseries "The Vow" has propelled this story back into the news.

You can also head over to our Patreon for some bonus content like our weekly mixed bags and monthly minisodes.

Thanks so much & keep it creepy!

Self-Help. Personal Growth. Life-improvement. Multi-level marketing schemes promise riches, better lives, and unimagined happiness. But beneath the surface of this organization was a secret society that drained its members of money, personal autonomy, and even their lives.
